name: Custom Easing Curves - NEW Animation
description:
A quick recreation of one of the animations in Figma's announcement of Custom Easing Curves (seen here: https://twitter.com/figmadesign/status/1291402217132396545). Everything is linked to its own component, so you can change the text to whatever you want :) 

I'm new to Smart Animate and Custom Curves, so I wanted to practice and use as few frames as possible. I'm excited to see remixes that recreate the animation even more faithfully!
